sqls.sql: select * from AT_D_BS_SORTSAMPLINGCOUNT where 1=1 <#if agenc_no_s??> and AGENC_NO_S=:agenc_no_s </#if> <#if arch_flag_s??> and ARCH_FLAG_S=:arch_flag_s </#if> <#if changed_by_s??> and CHANGED_BY_S=:changed_by_s </#if> <#if changed_time_t??> and CHANGED_TIME_T=:changed_time_t </#if> <#if created_by_s??> and CREATED_BY_S=:created_by_s </#if> <#if created_time_t??> and CREATED_TIME_T=:created_time_t </#if> <#if itemid_s??> and ITEMID_S=:itemid_s </#if> <#if num_i??> and NUM_I=:num_i </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and RECORD_FLAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if sample_num_i??> and SAMPLE_NUM_I=:sample_num_i </#if> <#if spare1_s??> and SPARE1_S=:spare1_s </#if> <#if spare2_s??> and SPARE2_S=:spare2_s </#if> <#if spare3_s??> and SPARE3_S=:spare3_s </#if> <#if spare4_s??> and SPARE4_S=:spare4_s </#if> <#if spare5_s??> and SPARE5_S=:spare5_s </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if> <#if sort??&&order??> order by ${sort} ${order} <#else> order by atr_key desc </#if>

select count(1) from AT_D_BS_SORTSAMPLINGCOUNT where 1=1 <#if agenc_no_s??> and AGENC_NO_S=:agenc_no_s </#if> <#if arch_flag_s??> and ARCH_FLAG_S=:arch_flag_s </#if> <#if changed_by_s??> and CHANGED_BY_S=:changed_by_s </#if> <#if changed_time_t??> and CHANGED_TIME_T=:changed_time_t </#if> <#if created_by_s??> and CREATED_BY_S=:created_by_s </#if> <#if created_time_t??> and CREATED_TIME_T=:created_time_t </#if> <#if itemid_s??> and ITEMID_S=:itemid_s </#if> <#if num_i??> and NUM_I=:num_i </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and RECORD_FLAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if sample_num_i??> and SAMPLE_NUM_I=:sample_num_i </#if> <#if spare1_s??> and SPARE1_S=:spare1_s </#if> <#if spare2_s??> and SPARE2_S=:spare2_s </#if> <#if spare3_s??> and SPARE3_S=:spare3_s </#if> <#if spare4_s??> and SPARE4_S=:spare4_s </#if> <#if spare5_s??> and SPARE5_S=:spare5_s </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if>
